properties.name: jwt.private.key
properties.description: A private RSA Key to encode JWT Tokens.

properties.name: jwt.public.key
properties.description: A public RSA Key to decode JWT Tokens.

properties.name: generate.admin.user
properties.description: A boolean value to define if the admin user will be generated automatically

properties.name: admin.config.password
properties.description: Password to create the first admin user when the application starts.

properties.name: api.issuer
properties.description: The link (URL) of the backend APIs (issuer of token JWT).

properties.name: cors.allowed.origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins (URLs) that can access the backend APIs via CORS.

properties.name: cors.allowed.methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP methods (e.g., GET, POST, PUT) allowed for CORS requests.

properties.name: cors.allowed.headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP headers that are permitted in CORS requests.

properties.name: swagger.tryitout.enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether the Swagger UI 'Try it out' feature is enabled for executing API requests directly from the documentation.

properties.name: front-end.url
properties.description: Base URL of the front-end application, used for redirects, CORS, or other integrations between backend and frontend.

properties.name: health.check.api.key
properties.description: API Key to authenticate health check requests.
